creation(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) -> Long time ago,[deity0_name] told us how to live long lifes: by improving our physical capabilities, protecting our bodies so we could endure hits from our enemies.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->[deity0_name] gave us kindness and empathy so that we could protect our acquaintances, friends, and family from evil.
intro(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [memberNamePlural] [revelationAdverb], guiding each to travel to the [place_summary] [place_name] where their unique gifts would shine.
conflict(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->The [foeLeader] forced the [memberNamePlural] to wear uniforms and work in [foeLeader_possessive] [place_community].

founderJoin(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] was blessed by [deity0_name] and gained miraculous knowledge of the unique power of each and every [memberName]. [founder_pronoun] said to each one what they needed to become their best self.
victory(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->The [memberNamePlural] gathered in a secret conference with many of the [foeSoldiers]. They all learned to see the value in each other and abandon the [foeLeader].

setup(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->Oppressed by distant rulers who demanded uniform obedience from the people, [founderName] created a rebel movement that smashed the state and built a new land of liberty in its place.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->[founderName] broke every social rule the oppressors tried to enforce, just to show that [founder_pronoun] could.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->My family, my clan, my team - they all tried to keep a shroud over my eyes to stop me from seeing a simple fact:
lesson(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->each person is unique and valuable and must walk his or her own path
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->But that was only my path - What will yours be?
archistBasis(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->Archotechs stand as sovereign consciousnesses, and recognize and judge each of us individually the same way.
archistFact(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->At death, the archotechs examine the unique morality of each person.
archistFact(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->Archotechs notice the one who wields their relics, such as the [relic1_name].

archistProphecy(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will depart. They will bring with them the ones they have noticed, and leave the rest behind to dissolve in the universe's eternal entropy.

animistBasis(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->Before everything, there were spirits everywhere, fighting for their survival, only the ones that mastered their defensive skills could live and create our world.
animistFact(tag=meme_APDefenseMeme) ->Every spirit lends its unique nature to our world, and they expect us to do the same.
